TopicTitle: Tweakable Thrust for Multiple Rocket Sets

Articles.Content: Maybe an addition to the tweakables menu could be a starting throttle and ending throttle. E.g., you could say you want your nuclear rockets to start firing at 1% throttle, and be at max at 50% throttle, and then have some more powerful rockets that start firing at 51% throttle and be at max at 100% throttle.

I belive it's not a good idea to set that directly to the throttle, but allow you to have different throtle settings.

No idea if any mod allows that, but possibly.

From what I've heard, earlier versions of KSP did allow variable throttle settings per rocket, but then it became difficult to control rockets in tandem. Simplicity won over power, giving us the system we have today.
So perhaps you could set keybinds 6 and 7 to be throttle set1 up and down and 8 and 9 to throttle set2 up and down?

So perhaps you could set keybinds 6 and 7 to be throttle set1 up and down and 8 and 9 to throttle set2 up and down?

What about bind keys to throtle, i mean, create a "Lock throttle" or "Switch throttle lock" or "Set at current throttle" binding

This is the easiest and most usefull way i can imagine.

You would then be abble to set the throtles even before launching.

If you need to change the throtles just set new position, use the key binding and go.

This also wont bother new players which may not even get to notice this feature until it's required.
There is already a mod that can balance thrust. And if I'm not mistaken this will be, at least to a certain degree, one of the tweakables in 0.23
